content: How do I add the logging parameters to the generated IG resource? Do I put that in an ig.ini in my fsh folder?
Hi @Jean Duteau -- currently, there isn't a way to do this without post processing, but the new beta release next week will provide a way to add whatever parameters you want.
this new beta release sounds like it might even make my supper! :)
Yes, although based on the previous thread in IG Creation, we should probably expect some bumps in the road. ;-)
